title: 170+ Deep, Heartfelt & Passionate Love Messages to Send Your Guy

steps.title: Send a short and sweet love note to brighten his day.
steps.content: Send a short and sweet love note to brighten his day. Whether you’re heading out to work, in the middle of a busy day, or want to express your love simply and concisely (without gushing too much), a short love message is the way to go. After all, a message doesn’t have to be long to be meaningful! I don’t need paradise because I found something better: you. Life is more beautiful with you in it. Every time you smile at me, the rest of the world disappears. Our love is so precious to me because it has no boundaries. Just wanted to remind you that I’m yours, and always will be. Never forget: I love you exactly the way you are. You’re amazing! With you, I feel more excited by the possibilities in front of us than ever before. When I picture my future, you’re right there with me. I love you! I will always choose you—every single day. My favorite place in the world is wherever you are. You’ve given me a kind of love I didn’t know truly existed. Thank you. Your love grounds me and makes me feel like I can do anything. I love everything about you, from your wonderful mind to your kind heart. My love for you has no limits, and it’s always growing. I can’t wait to spend the rest of my life with you, my love.

steps.title: Craft a long love message to express your feelings.
steps.content: Craft a long love message to express your feelings. If you have the time to sit down and write (or send) a longer love message, don’t hold back. Tell him everything that’s on your mind, whether you’re missing him, feeling grateful for him, or you’re just feeling overwhelmed with love. You can be more specific and detailed with a long love message! I love everything about you. I love how kind you are, how patient you can be, and how you always go out of your way to make me feel adored and cared for. Thank you for everything you do, my love. I feel so lucky to be with you. You’re the man of my dreams, my true love, and I can’t wait to start building a future with you because I know it will be a wonderful one. Never forget that I love you, and I always will. I’m so overjoyed and proud to be your partner. You help me be the best version of myself while supporting and encouraging me. With you, I feel truly seen—and truly loved. Thank you for being yourself, and the best partner I could ask for. Every piece of you is perfect to me. I want you, in mind and (of course) body. Being close to you will never cease to thrill me, and I love knowing that you’re all mine, just as I’m all yours. You make me happy in so many different ways, and you’re never far from my thoughts. When I’m with you, all I want to do is be close to you—and when we’re apart, I’m always thinking about how you make me feel and how lucky I am to know you. Our love is like a wild and dazzling adventure, and I wouldn’t have it any other way. We’ve had more than our share of incredible journeys and unbelievable experiences, and I love that together, we’ve learned to live each day to the fullest. Here’s to many, many more days together.

steps.title: Show him the true depths of your feelings with a heartfelt message.
steps.content: Show him the true depths of your feelings with a heartfelt message. All of the messages in this article are deep love messages, but these ones truly come right from the heart. Don’t be afraid to be a little vulnerable when writing a heartfelt message. “Vulnerability is the birthplace of intimacy, so if you’re feeling something just say it,” says clinical psychologist Dr. Sarah Schewitz. Finding you helped me understand what I’d been searching for my whole life. I love you so very much! I love you. I love your body, your soul, your mind, and how I feel when I’m around you. I’m honored to be yours! The way you look at me completely melts my heart. You make me feel loved and desired, like I’m the most important person in the world. My love for you is beyond words, measure, and time. It’s infinite and endless! Sometimes it feels like I’m having a dream, but then I remember that it’s all real—and so are you. How lucky am I? Thank you for being mine! You are the only amazing person I want to come home to. Being with you just makes sense, even when nothing else does. The more time passes, the more I learn new things to love about you. As long as you love me, my world is perfect. Each moment with you feels like a fairytale come true. I never want to let go of the love we share! Everything in my life has led me to you. Through all the choices I’ve made and regrets I have, meeting you has been worth all of it. I wouldn’t change a single thing! I didn’t always believe in soulmates, but you’ve changed my mind. You made me believe, and now I know that you’re the love of my life.

steps.title: Share your affection for him with a sentimental message.
steps.content: Share your affection for him with a sentimental message. There’s nothing wrong with getting a little sappy sometimes, right? Showing affection is fundamental to any relationship, so a cute and adoring love message is sure to make him smile. I hope you know CPR—because you take my breath away. With you, I finally understand what all those sappy love songs are about. Everyone has their own motivation to get up in the morning, and seeing you is mine. Thank you for being my knight in shining armor. I love you so much! You and I are the same kind of strange, and I love that about us. I feel safest and happiest when I’m in your arms. I could stare into those eyes of yours for an eternity. When I’m having a bad day, all you have to do is show up and everything gets brighter. Every time I hug you, I never want to let you go! Nobody’s perfect, but you come pretty darn close.

steps.title: Express gratitude for him and everything he does for you.
steps.content: Express gratitude for him and everything he does for you. “Men, more than anything, want to be appreciated for what they do,” explains Schewitz. So, try to be specific. What do you love about him? Why are you so grateful for him? Having specifics can make your message feel more authentic and touching—and expressing gratitude is a great way to strengthen your bond. Thank you for being my rock and biggest supporter, my love. It means the world to me! Words can’t express how thankful I am for you. Having you at my side gives me the courage to do anything. I’m forever grateful for you, and the way you make me feel desired and wanted. Your love always brings light to my life, even on cloudy days. You’re my strength. When I reach down inside myself and do things I’m not capable of, it’s because of you. Thank you for loving me unconditionally. You listen to me, value me, and make me feel cherished every single day. Looking back, I’m grateful for every change, decision, and fork in the road that led me to you. Thank you for always believing in me, and encouraging me to chase my dreams and goals even when it means taking a risk. Your belief is the best gift I’ve ever been given. Thank you for always going above and beyond to make me happy. Your romantic gestures are absolutely magical, and never cease to amaze me. I love the way you’re always leaving me sweet little notes, so here’s my attempt to do the same. Thank you for making me feel so special, and remember that I love you with everything in my heart. Thank you for everything, my love: the adventures, the late-night conversations, the way you hold me, and so much more.

steps.title: Turn up the heat and spark his passion with an intimate message.
steps.content: Turn up the heat and spark his passion with an intimate message. Sometimes a love message is only about expressing love—but sometimes you might want to flirt a little, too. Whether you want to build up his anticipation for the next time you see each other or just want to tease him with something seductive, try giving him an intimate love message. Thinking about your handsome face and wishing I could kiss it. It’s crazy how distracting you are when you’re not even here! Do you have any idea how much my heart races when I see you? When you touch me, everything else fades away, and every kiss is intoxicating. I can’t stop thinking about the way you hold me close and whisper sweet words in my ear. You make ordinary days extraordinary. When we’re together, you ignite my passion like nobody else ever has. Every moment in your arms feels electric, and I’ll never get enough of it. I can still feel your kiss on my lips. Your love is beyond anything I could imagine. I love the way my hand fits in yours like we were made for one another. Your touch sets my soul on fire! You bring out my wild side in the best possible way, and I love you all the more for it. Every time you wrap your arms around me, it feels like our souls are connected, too.

steps.title: Reassure him that you’re always in his corner.
steps.content: Reassure him that you’re always in his corner. It’s important for partners to feel supported in a relationship; after all, you’re a team! So, part of loving a guy is being there for him—and making sure he knows it. Try giving him a love message that’s both romantic and supportive, so he feels like he can do anything. [1] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source Whether you need advice, a hug, or a helping hand, you only have to ask. I’m always here for you, my love. My love, your strength and determination amaze me. You can do anything you set your mind to! One of the things I love most about us is how we support each other without even needing to be asked. I’ll always be here for you, and I know you’re here for me, too. I want you to know that I’ll always be your biggest cheerleader. I love you so much! You are a fierce, driving spirit, even when you’re knocked down. I believe in you, my love! Whenever you need me, I’ll be there—because you’ve always done the same for me. Anytime you need a shoulder to cry on or just someone to remind you how incredible you are, you know I’m all over it. I love you! If you ever start doubting yourself, I’ll believe in you enough for the both of us, if I have to! You have so many talents—which is just one of the reasons I adore you so much. My love, I’m right beside you in challenging times. Your strength and devotion inspire me, and I’m here to support you 100%. You’re not alone on this path. I’ll be with you every step of the way, celebrating every success and lifting you up during tough times.

steps.title: Remind him that you’re fully committed to him (and the relationship).
steps.content: Remind him that you’re fully committed to him (and the relationship). If you want your boyfriend, husband, or fiancé to know that you take your commitment seriously, you could write about it in your love message. Make him a promise—whether it’s simply to be loyal to the relationship, or something else (like making him laugh often, or standing up for him when he needs it). I vow to fall in love with you a little more each day, because what we have is true love. We’re stronger together, and I know our love will withstand the test of time. I promise to cherish our love, forever and always. You are my true love, my lifelong partner, and everything I could want—and more. I’m dedicated to protecting our love and keeping it strong, and I’m dedicated to you. Our love is unbreakable and one-of-a-kind. I’ll always be here to hold your hand. I vow to love you no matter what—in good times, bad times, and everything in between. I promise to be your rock, your best friend, your partner in crime, and your partner in everything else, too. I will stand by you through thick and thin, loving you and supporting you every step of the way. I’m deeply and unconditionally in love with you, and I wouldn't want it any other way.

steps.title: Tell him how much happiness he brings to your life.
steps.content: Tell him how much happiness he brings to your life. Knowing how overjoyed you are with him will likely make him feel happy, too! With any love type of message, however, don’t be afraid to get a little creative. You could write a note (or text), or think outside the box and give him a drawing or painting, song, poem, music playlist, or some other memorable creation. Your love makes me happier than anything else. It’s a gift, and I plan to cherish it forever. Nothing makes me happier than laughing with you, kissing you, and spending every moment possible in your arms. True happiness is being by your side, my love. I can’t imagine my life without you; you’ve brought so many happy changes to it, and I never want to go back to the way things were. You’re my happily ever after my love—even though I don’t know if it’s possible to be happier than I am now! By loving me, you make me the happiest person in the world. Other people might claim to be happier, but I doubt it! Loving is so easy when it’s with you. You illuminate my world with happiness and warmth! My heart is yours completely. You make me feel so happy, even when nothing else can. You fill my life with joy. Thank you for loving me, and letting me love you back. You have an incredible way of making my heart happy in a way that nobody else does.

steps.title: Reminisce on your favorite memories of the relationship.
steps.content: Reminisce on your favorite memories of the relationship. A truly great love message feels personalized in some way; try avoiding generic statements and add details that apply specifically to him and your relationship. Reminiscing can be a great way to do that, because it allows you to reflect on the good times you’ve shared together. [2] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good Magazine Journal published by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center, which uses scientific research to promote happier living Go to source Every moment with you is time well spent, and each memory we make is more special than the last. Come what may, I cherish you and every laugh, tear, and moment we share. Do you remember the day we first said, “I love you”? I didn’t think it was possible to love you more than I did then, but I was wrong. I treasure the memories we share more than anything else. You’re my favorite adventuring partner in life, and I treasure every memory of our adventures thus far. I’m grateful for all the moments that make us who we are, and form the foundation of this beautiful relationship. Nobody has been able to make me laugh until my stomach hurts quite as much as you, and I love you to pieces for it. Imagining our first kiss still makes me lose my train of thought, even now. Every joke we’ve made, kiss we’ve shared, and “I love you” we’ve exchanged adds to our story—the best story of all. No matter where I am or what I’m doing, thinking of the day we met makes me so very happy.

steps.title: Send him a loving note to show him when you’re missing him.
steps.content: Send him a loving note to show him when you’re missing him. If your guy is out of town, busy for a few days, or even has just gone to work (and you’re already missing him), you could send a longing message. This shows how much you love having him around, and want to be close to him. Missing you especially much right now. If I could teleport to where you are, my love, I’d do it in a heartbeat. You’re my favorite hello and my hardest goodbye. I miss you so very much, my love. Every time we’re apart it just reminds me how irreplaceable you are—your voice, your smile, and your loving touch. I miss you! You’re always in my thoughts, my dreams, and every single heartbeat. I just want you to know that you’re the man of my dreams, and I miss you more than I thought it was possible to miss someone. The days would pass so much easier if I could spend more of them in your arms! I miss everything about you: your touch, the way you look at me, and how it feels when I’m in your arms. Counting down the days until we’re together again! The world feels a little duller without you here to light it up with your smile. I can’t wait to see you again! I know your heart is always with me, but I still miss you so very much. Every time a love song comes on the radio, it just reminds me of you and the love you bring to my life. Missing you so much!

steps.title: Give him a romantic note to brighten his morning or sweeten his night.
steps.content: Give him a romantic note to brighten his morning or sweeten his night. If you and your guy don’t live together (or are apart for a few days), a cute good morning or good night text can help you stay connected. Plus, it may help you both wake up (or go to bed) with smiles on your faces. Rise and shine, light of my life! On the downside, you have to wake up—but on the upside, we’ll get to see each other today. ❤️ Good morning to the greatest guy in the world! I wish I were there, waking up with you. 🥰 I woke up with a smile on my face because you were the star of my dreams, handsome. 🌟 Good morning, my love! I hope your day is nice, low-stress, and full of good things.😍 Good morning! I don’t know about you, but my mornings are never as bright when I can’t see you. 😘 You’re my favorite good morning. Can’t wait until I’m waking up in your arms again! 💋💋 Have a good night, love. When I close my eyes, all I see is you. 🌠 Good night, honey! Sleep well, and dream sweet dreams of us. 💋🌟 Whenever I wish on a star, all I wish for is more time with you. Good night! ✨ Just wanted to wish you a good night and remind you how much I love you—to the moon and back! 🌙 Every night, I thank the stars for letting our paths cross. It’s the best thing that ever happened to me. 💫 Going to sleep knowing you’re mine is the best feeling in the world! I love you today and every day. ❤️❤️‍🔥

steps.title: Text him romantic sentiments when you can’t say them in person.
steps.content: Text him romantic sentiments when you can’t say them in person. One of the easiest ways to write your partner a love message is via text; it’s quick, easy, and gets delivered instantly. So, here are a few love messages designed specifically for a text (with colorful emojis to make each message feel lighthearted and whimsical). I fell hard for you, and I wouldn’t have it any other way. ❤️‍🔥 You make everything better and brighter. Thank you for being you! ☀️ You’re so very special to me. Never doubt that you have my whole heart. ❤️ Will I ever stop feeling butterflies in my stomach when I look at you? I don’t think so! 🦋 I love that you see all of me and love me anyway! 💘 I’m in love with you, and all the tiny little things that make you who you are. 💗 I am beyond lucky to have fallen in love with my best friend. 💕 From the first day I met you, I knew life would never be the same. Thank you, my love. 💋 Rain or sunshine, my day is special with you in it. 🥰 Hey, I just wanted you to know that you’re my favorite person on the planet. 🌎 Just so you know I love you more than I did yesterday…but not more than I will tomorrow. ❤️ You want to know who I’m in love with? Read the first word in the text again. 😘 Any time my phone vibrates, I can’t help hoping you’re the one causing it. I just love you so much! ❣️

steps.title: Stay connected long-distance by sending him sweet love notes.
steps.content: Stay connected long-distance by sending him sweet love notes. Long-distance relationships aren’t always easy, and communication is the key to making them work. That’s why sending your guy a love message—either by text or in a physical letter—can help him feel closer to you, even when you’re far apart. Anytime you feel far away from me, remember that as long as we breathe the same air and gaze up at the same sky every day, there’s nowhere my love can’t reach you. Long-distance is hard, but I know there’s nothing we can’t do together. I love you more than I’ve ever loved anyone else! Every moment we spend apart only strengthens my love for you and reminds me how much I miss you. Long distance isn’t easy, but it’s all worth it to be with you. Thank you for continuing to love and support me from afar! We might be far apart, but my heart is always with you—and you’re always with me, in my dreams. I know we’ve both had our ups and downs while managing a long-distance relationship, but we always pull through because our love and devotion to one another is so true. I love you so much. I’m so grateful that our love keeps getting stronger, even though we live in two different places. That’s what makes us special! Anytime someone asks me why I’d be in a long-distance relationship, I tell them the same thing: it’s not about the distance but the person, and you’re worth fighting for. I haven’t seen your face in a while, handsome. Could you send me a new picture to gaze at lovingly? You’ve been on my mind today, and I’m dying to see you. How about we do a video call later, so I can tell you directly how much I love you? Reader Poll: We asked 562 wikiHow readers, and 64% agreed that the gesture they think would make their long-distance boyfriend feel the most special is sending him sweet messages . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Share romantic lyrics that capture how you feel about him.
steps.content: Share romantic lyrics that capture how you feel about him. Sometimes it’s hard to find the right words to express yourself—and if that’s the case, you can always have a professional songwriter do some of the talking. Try picking a romantic song lyric that feels meaningful to you, and reflects your relationship somehow. “I hope you don’t mind that I put down in words how wonderful life is while you’re in the world.” - Elton John “Long live all the mountains we moved, I had the time of my life fighting dragons with you.” - Taylor Swift, “Long Live” "I bless the day I found you; I wanna stay around you; Now and forever, let it be me." - The Everly Brothers, “Let It Be Me” “I’m lucky I’m in love with my best friend, lucky to have been where I have been, lucky to be coming home again.” - Colbie Caillat and Jason Mraz, “Lucky” "You smiled, and then the spell was cast, and here we are in heaven, for you are mine at last." - Etta James, “At Last” "If the sun refused to shine, I would still be loving you. If the mountains crumble to the sea, there will still be you and me.” - Led Zeppelin, “Thank You” "Heaven is not fit to house a love like you and I" - Hozier, “Francesca” "You fill my heart with gladness, take away all my sadness, ease my trouble, that's what you do" - Rod Stewart, "Have I Told You Lately" “I could make you happy, make your dreams come true. Nothing that I wouldn’t do, go to the ends of the Earth for you yo make you feel my love.” - Adele, “To Make You Feel My Love” "You’re spring to me, all things to me." - Nina Simone, “Wild is the Wind” “I love you always, forever. Near and far, closer together, everywhere I will be with you.” - Donna Lewis, “I Love You Always Forever” “Forever, forever, you’ll stay in my heart and I will love you. Forever, and ever, we never will part, oh, how I love you.” - Aretha Franklin, “I Say A Little Prayer”

steps.title: Complete your love message with a poignant romantic quote.
steps.content: Complete your love message with a poignant romantic quote. If you’d rather use a traditional quote rather than song lyrics, there’s plenty of eloquent prose about the magic of love from talented authors, speakers, and public figures. Add a romantic quote to your love message to emphasize the depths of your feelings for him! "My heart is and always will be yours." - Jane Austen "If I had a flower for every time I thought of you… I could walk through my garden forever." - Alfred Tennyson “In case you ever foolishly forget: I am never not thinking of you.” - Virginia Woolf "Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place." - Zora Neale Hurston “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.” - A.A. Milne "The best thing to hold onto in life is each other." - Audrey Hepburn "You are, and always have been, my dream." - Nicholas Sparks "I swear I couldn’t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow." - Leo Christopher “In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.” - Maya Angelou "When I saw you, I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew." - Arrigo Boito “When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.” - When Harry Met Sally "Love understands love; it needs no talk" - Frances Havergal "I love you, not only for what you are but for what I am when I am with you." - Roy Croft “The real lover is a man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.” - Marilyn Monroe
